He scored the first two touchdowns of his comeback in a December 2009 rout of the Falcons at the Dome.`` I'll never forget this day,'' an emotional Michael Vick said after the game. I'll never forget coming back to the city of Atlanta. I'll never forget arriving yesterday. I'll never forget seeing a lot of the landmarks I used to see when I lived in this city for six years. I'll never forget shedding a tear on the bus ride over here this morning because I took that route every Sunday to come here and play. SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate.''
